location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: 'BAHREIN. SITE of POSSIBLE NAVAL BASE. (From Admty Chart No. 3540).'

physicalDescription.extent: Materials: Printed on paper with manuscript additions in red ink.Dimensions: 290 x 207mm on sheet 330 x 230mm.

mods.abstract: The map shows part of Bahrein [Bahrain] Island including al Menama [Manama] and Muharrak [Muharraq]. Inscribed 'N.S.(P.D.) April 1937'. A note states that 'The area enclosed by the dotted line is Government land'. The map includes manuscript annotations in red ink signed by JGL [John Gilbert Laithwaite of the India Office]. Scale: 5 cables = 37mm.
